txt.en: 'Orcs are cruel beings. They have left many traps throughout the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>, designed to injure and maim, more than to capture.\n\n'Will you help me find and disable them?'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. Now the beasts of the wood and the Men who journey here will be able to pass without fear of maiming.'
Andreg is taking you to meet with Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp; however, he needs help with his own mission first.
Andreg has asked you to help him find and disable Orc-traps throughout the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
You should speak with Andreg regarding the traps you disabled.
